title: Poetic Engagement of the World - Charlie B and Shari
description:
Shari and Charlie meet up to talk about the magic of language..again. The role of poetry in culture over the years and how it may have a point to play within culture and it's engagement with being and nature. 
Charlie would also like to apologize for the terrible audio and is trying to make a more tolerable track

the making of a sacred object https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Za-Cml8VRi0&t=110s

Traces https://docs.google.com/document/d/1dwT_OnHt8puoBScmhpt9kFhppnFxPDmfWdYKSsoe0TY/edit?usp=sharing
